content: विभावः {@--1@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) Any condition which produces or develops a particular state of body or mind; (one of the three main divisions of {%Bhāvas%}, the other two being अनुभाव and ब्याभिचारिभाव <ab>q. v.</ab>); रत्याद्युद्वोधका लोके विभावाः काव्यनाट्ययोः <ls>S. D. 62</ls>; its chief subdivisions are आलंबन and उद्दीपक; see आलंबन. {@--2@} A friend, an acquaintance. {@--3@} Any exciting circumtance, (as dress &c.).
